extensionDescription.message: Manage and moderate all your mailman lists in one place
extensionDescription.description: A longer description for this extension

headingMain.description: The heading for the mailing lists panel

headingNew.description: The heading for the editing panel when creating a new list

headingEdit.description: The heading for the editing panel when editing an existing list

headingDetails.description: The heading for the mail details panel

listLabelName.description: The label for the name field in the edit list form

listLabelBaseurl.description: The label for the baseurl field in the edit list form

listLabelPassword.description: The label for the password field in the edit list form

listHelpName.message: The list name, must be unique. Multiple same-name lists on different servers can be entered as 'list@domain1.com', 'list@domain2.net', etc.
listHelpName.description: A help message for the name field in the edit list form

listHelpBaseurl.message: The URL to the moderation interface, excluding the list name itself
listHelpBaseurl.description: A help message for the baseurl field in the edit list form

listLoading.description: The text displayed when a list has not finished loading

listNoMessages.description: The text displayed when no new messages are available

listErrUnknown.description: The message displayed when loading a list failed for an unknown reason

listErrNotFound.description: The message displayed when the computed URL points to no list at all

listErrBadPassword.description: The message displayed when the given password is invalid

listJoinRequest.description: The subject displayed for a join request message

actionSelect.description: The text displayed when no action has been selected

actionRefreshAll.description: The text for the refresh all action option

actionNew.description: The text for the create new list action option

actionEdit.description: The text for the edit selected list action option

actionDelete.description: The text for the delete selected list action option

buttonActionGo.description: The caption for the perform action button

buttonOptions.description: The caption for the about and options button

buttonCancel.description: The caption for the cancel buttons

buttonSave.description: The caption for the save changes button

buttonDetails.description: The caption for the mail details button

buttonDecideLater.description: The caption for the mail decide later button

buttonAccept.description: The caption for the mail accept button

buttonReject.description: The caption for the mail reject button

buttonDiscard.description: The caption for the mail discard button

buttonImport.description: The caption for the import lists button

buttonExport.description: The caption for the export lists button

buttonClearLists.description: The caption for the clear all lists button

buttonClearListsConfirm.description: The caption for the button to confirm the clear operation

warningClearLists.message: This will remove all lists and their login credentials. If cloud synchronization is enabled, this also affects the cloud data — Click this message to cancel.
warningClearLists.description: The warning displayed before deleting all lists

mailTime.description: The mail receival time field name

errNoListsFound.description: The message displayed when no lists are found

errNoActionSelected.description: The error displayed when clicking the perform action button with no action selected

errNoListSelected.description: The error displayed when trying to perform an action with no list selected

errListNameEmpty.description: The error displayed when trying to save a list with an empty name

errListNameIllegal.message: Error: List name contains illegal characters!
errListNameIllegal.description: The error displayed when trying to save a list with an illegal name

errListBaseurlProtocol.message: Error: Base URL does not contain a valid protocol (http:// or https://)!
errListBaseurlProtocol.description: The error displayed when trying to save a list with an invalid or missing base URL protocol

errListBaseurlIllegal.message: Error: Base URL contains illegal characters!
errListBaseurlIllegal.description: The error displayed when trying to save a list with an illegal base URL

errListPasswordEmpty.description: The error displayed when trying to save a list with an empty moderation password

errStorageAccess.description: The error displayed when a storage access failed

errSyncNotAvailable.message: Error accessing sync storage: '$1' — Check if you are connected to the internet and using the most recent version of your browser.
errSyncNotAvailable.description: The error displayed when enabling the sync storage failed.

errImportFiletype.message: Invalid filetype! Only JSON files are allowed.
errImportFiletype.description: The error displayed when trying to import from a non-JSON file

errImportParseError.message: Import Error: The provided file contains invalid data!
errImportParseError.description: The error displayed when the provided file could not be parsed as mailing lists correctly

errClearError.message: Error: One or more records could not be deleted!
errClearError.description: The error displayed when a list could not be deleted

statusLoading.description: The status message displayed when loading the popup

statusImportSuccessful.description: The message displayed after a successful import

statusClearSuccessful.description: The message displayed after a successful clear

settingUseSync.message: Sync credentials with your browser's cloud
settingUseSync.description: The text displayed on the use sync checkbox
